name: MADE WITH LOVE IN PHILADELPHIA BADGE
tagline: For Philadelphia based startups to let the world know
body:
![Made With Love in Philadelphia Badge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/trevorgeise/madewithloveinphilly/master/madewithloveinphilly.png)

### ABOUT THE BADGE
After some extensive searching I couldn't find any type of 'made in philly' badge. That seemed silly so I built one for the launch of [salesbox.io](salesbox.io).

Now I'd love for anyone else interested to use it as well. Perhaps down the road I'll build out a little site where all Philly startups can be listed.

### Authors and Contributors
Design by @trevorgeise

### Support or Contact
Contact @trevorgeise
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
